code: import'./TeamButton.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TeamButton(props){var teamName=props.teamName,teamTitle=props.teamTitle,selectedTeam=props.selectedTeam,toggleBlurb=props.toggleBlurb;var LOGO_CLASSES=['team-logo-original','team-logo-selected','team-logo-unselected'];var TEXT_CLASSES=['team-text-original','team-text-selected','team-text-unselected'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:teamName+'-glow',onClick:function onClick(){return toggleBlurb(teamName);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:selectedTeam===teamName?teamName+'-logo '+LOGO_CLASSES[1]:selectedTeam===''?teamName+'-logo '+LOGO_CLASSES[0]:teamName+'-logo '+LOGO_CLASSES[2],style:{transition:'0.5s'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:teamName+'-text',className:selectedTeam===teamName?teamName+'-text '+TEXT_CLASSES[1]:selectedTeam===''?teamName+'-text '+TEXT_CLASSES[0]:teamName+'-text '+TEXT_CLASSES[2],style:{transition:'0.5s'},children:teamTitle})]});}export default TeamButton;
